content: In 2022, there was a significant increase in the number of new school clients that needed RCM to help offer their students behavioral health services by providing students with access to these services, schools are helping to address a vital need and support the well-being of their students. We're especially pleased with our fourth quarter year-over-year gross profit growth with specialty health care growing by $1.9 million or 21%, engineering growing by $0.6 million or 12%.
